docreader.range.paragraph

Class ParagraphListAware

  • java.lang.Object
    • docreader.range.paragraph.ParagraphListAware

  • public final class ParagraphListAware
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to circumvent a bug in POI when it does not correctly detect a list paragraph

    Note: Ideally this should simply subclass Paragraph. However, POI does not provide any suitable constructor to do so.

    Author:
    Moritz Dorka
